alert.note: Alert for Central and East Adams and Arapahoe Counties; Central and South Weld County; Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Logan County; Morgan County; North and Northeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, North Lincoln County; Northeast Weld County; Southeast Elbert County Below 6000 Feet, South Lincoln County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 24 at 8:28PM MST until December 27 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Fort Collins, Briggsdale, Greeley, Fort Morgan, Byers, Limon, Southern Lincoln County, Sterling, and Akron. * WHEN...From Monday evening through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions are expected. Areas of blowing dust will be possible in areas that did not experience recent snowfall. Meanwhile, blowing snow will be possible in areas that see additional snowfall, with the greatest risk of that from eastern Adams and Arapahoe Counties into Washington County.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Visibility may change rapidly. Use extra caution.
